meanings.definition: A group of people living in a particular area.
meanings.sent1: The demoi gathered at the park for a community event.
meanings.sent2: The demoi in the neighborhood organized a clean-up day.
meanings.sent3: The demoi decided to have a potluck to get to know each other better.
meanings.sent4: The demoi of students cheered together at the school assembly.
meanings.sent5: The demoi of fans filled the stadium with excitement.

meanings.definition: To show or explain how something works.
meanings.sent1: Can you demoi how to use this new software?
meanings.sent2: She will demoi the proper technique for painting the walls.
meanings.sent3: He demoi'd the recipe for the class in a fun and engaging way.
meanings.sent4: The mechanic demoi'd the engine's inner workings to the curious customer.
meanings.sent5: The teacher demoi'd the science experiment step by step.

meanings.definition: A short recording of a song used to promote it.
meanings.sent1: The radio station played the demoi of the new single.
meanings.sent2: The band sent out demoi CDs to record labels.
meanings.sent3: She listened to the demoi of the song before deciding to buy it.
meanings.sent4: The demoi of the track gave listeners a taste of the upcoming album.
meanings.sent5: The demoi showcased the artist's vocal range and style.

meanings.sent1: The demoi outside City Hall demanded change.
meanings.sent2: The peaceful demoi marched through the streets with banners.
meanings.sent3: The demoi against pollution drew attention to environmental issues.
meanings.sent4: The demoi at the courthouse called for justice.
meanings.sent5: The demoi was a powerful display of unity and determination.
